title: Episode 140: Monogamy (Feat. Jill Marie Jones, Vanessa Simmons & Blue Kimble)
itunes:title: Episode 140: Monogamy (Feat. Jill Marie Jones, Vanessa Simmons & Blue Kimble)
description:
On this weeks episode, the cast of Monogamy sit with the ladies of Lip Service. Angela lays out hypothetical scenarios for the cast to act out, as well as helping the listeners with their own questions. Gigi gets personal when she starts explaining the pros and cons while having a non-monogamous relationship. Blue shares his experiences with "bat-shit crazy" women, while the ladies share their own ranking of their freaky-ness!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
